sql-script.name: organization
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_organization_account ( id char(32) not null, name varchar(32) not null, password varchar(32) default '' not null, status tinyint not null, accountmark tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, login bit not null, sessionid varchar(32), lastlogindate timestamp, lastloginip varchar(24), logintimes int not null, onlinemillis bigint not null, mailbinding bit not null, mobilebinding bit not null, longitude double not null, latitude double not null, citycode varchar(16), openprovider varchar(16), openid varchar(64), mdevid varchar(32), primary key(id), unique(name) );

create table sf_organization_user ( id char(32) not null, departmentid char(32), orgid char(32), text varchar(32) not null, sex varchar(2) not null, birthday date, hometown varchar(32), email varchar(32), homephone varchar(16), officephone varchar(16), mobile varchar(16), mobile2 varchar(16), address varchar(256), postcode varchar(8), qq varchar(16), msn varchar(16), description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_organization_department ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, departmenttype tinyint not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_organization_role ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), rolechartid char(32) not null, orgid char(32), name varchar(64) not null, text varchar(32) not null, roletype tinyint not null, rolemark tinyint not null, userrole bit not null, rulehandler varchar(128), rulescript clob, description varchar(256), members int not null, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(orgid, rolechartid, name), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolechart ( id char(32) not null, orgid char(32), name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, roles int not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(orgid, name), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolemember ( id char(32) not null, roleid char(32) not null, membertype tinyint not null, memberid char(32) not null, deptid char(32), primaryrole bit not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique(roleid, membertype, memberid, deptid), unique(oorder) );

create table sf_organization_accountstat ( id char(32) not null, deptid char(32), orgid char(32), stattype tinyint not null, nums int not null, online_nums int not null, state_normal int not null, state_registration int not null, state_locked int not null, state_delete int not null, primary key(id) );
